value.name: Incremental
value.helpText: Select the option Yes if the Service Provider search has to be extended by the timestamp this job was last time executed successfully as a filter criteria; otherwise select option No

value.name: Search Filter
value.helpText: Specifies which filter criteria has to be applied to retrieve directory entries. Must be a valid ICF search filter if specified

value.name: Search Scope
value.helpText: Specifies the scope of the search to retrieve objects from target system. Has to be either Object, OneLevel or SubTree

value.name: Last Reconciled
value.helpText: Holds the timestamp when this task was last executed successfully

value.name: Reconciliation Object
value.helpText: The name of the object to reconcile

value.name: IT Resource
value.helpText: The IT Resource used to establish the connection to the Service Provider

value.name: Reconciliation Operation
value.helpText: The operation to perform on the object to reconcile. Has to be either Refresh or Update

value.name: Encoded Value
value.helpText: The name of the entity attribute that has to be stored as the encoded value

value.name: Lookup Group
value.helpText: The value written to Lookup Group in case the operation on a particular Lookup Definition has to create it

value.name: Reconciliation Source
value.helpText: The identifier of the source (aka ObjectClass) that has to be used to reconcile

value.name: Search Container
value.helpText: Specifies the object class to retrieve from the search base

value.name: Decoded Value
value.helpText: The name of the entity attribute that has to be stored as the decoded value

value.name: Gather Only
value.helpText: Select this option if the data should only be gathered from the reconciliation source

value.name: Dependent Job
value.helpText: Specifies the name of the Job that will be started by this Job on successfully completion

value.name: Search Base
value.helpText: Specifies the search base to retrieve entries from the target system

value.helpText: Select the option Yes if the entitlements loaded needs to be prefixed with the internal system identifier and/or the name of the IT Resource

value.helpText: Select the option Yes if the Service Provider search has to be extended by the timestamp this job was last time executed successfully as a filter criteria; otherwise select option No

value.name: Last Reconciled
value.helpText: Holds the timestamp when this task was last executed successfully

value.name: Reconciliation Object
value.helpText: The name of the object to reconcile

value.name: Ignore Dublicates
value.helpText: Select the option Yes to prevent event creation and processing of Service Provider data that already exists in Identity Manager; otherwise select option No

value.name: IT Resource
value.helpText: The IT Resource used to establish the connection to the Service Provider

value.name: Reconciliation Descriptor
value.helpText: The path to the descriptor which specifies the mapping between the incomming field names and the reconciliation fields of the object to reconcile

value.name: Search Container
value.helpText: Specifies the objectClass to retrieve entries from the target system

value.name: Gather Only
value.helpText: Select this option if the data should only be gathered from the reconciliation source

value.name: Batch Size
value.helpText: Specifies the size of a batch read from the Service Provider

value.name: Thread Pool Size
value.helpText: Specifies that how many threads this task should create to distribute the workload

value.name: Dependent Job
value.helpText: Specifies the name of the Job that will be started by this Job on successfully completion

value.name: Search Base
value.helpText: Specifies the search base to retrieve entries from the target system
